definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Go out the Xiong Kejian that grew experience answered a village to build rice face processing factory.
sentences.chinese: 外出長了見識的熊克儉回村建了米麪加工廠。

sentences.english: She is always industrious and frugal, thrifty even in days of abundance.
sentences.chinese: 她總是克勤克儉，富日子當窮日子過。
